participant_1.background:
I am passionate about making music and expressing myself through it.
I don't go to Comic Con because it is not my kind of thing.
i like dogs.
I like to have a place where I can fully immerse myself in my fantasy world.
My most valued material possession is my stethoscope

participant_2.background:
My favorite people are my pets, Felix and Emmy.
i like video games.
I don't know much about my parents because they left me when I was young.
i m about to go off to college at a very liberal school soon.
I live a quiet life and enjoy my own company.

content.text: It's nice to meet you!  What are your favorite things?
My favorite things are my pets, Felix and Emmy.  What are yours?
I love dogs!  I also love making music and video games.  What do you enjoy doing?
I love video games too!  I live a pretty quiet life and enjoy my own company.  I'm about to go off to college at a very liberal school soon.
That's exciting!  I'm sure you'll have a great time.  I'm not much of a people person so I tend to keep to myself too.  What are you most excited about for college?
I'm excited to meet new people and learn about new things.  I'm also looking forward to being more independent and living on my own.
That's great!  I'm sure you'll do great things
